included.title: What's Included in Every Rental?
included.subtitle: Everything you need for a worry-free driving experience

insurance.title: Comprehensive Insurance
insurance.desc: Full coverage for vehicle damage, theft, and third-party liability. Drive with complete peace of mind.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Service
maintenance.desc: All regular maintenance, tire changes, and technical inspections are covered. We handle everything.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.desc: Round-the-clock roadside assistance wherever you are. Help is always just a phone call away.

flexibility.title: Flexible Terms
flexibility.desc: Extend or modify your rental anytime. No penalties, no hassle, complete flexibility.

howItWorks.subtitle: Simple Process
howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Renting a Tesla has never been easier. Follow these simple steps and hit the road.

step1.title: Choose Your Vehicle
step1.desc: Browse our premium Tesla fleet and select the model that best suits your needs and preferences.

step2.title: Book Online
step2.desc: Complete our simple booking form, select your dates, and confirm your reservation in minutes.

step3.title: Drive Away
step3.desc: Pick up your fully charged Tesla at the agreed location and enjoy your premium driving experience.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about renting with us
faq.q1: What documents do I need to rent a vehicle?
faq.a1: You'll need a valid driver's license held for at least 3 years, a passport or ID card, and proof of address. The minimum age requirement is 21 years.
faq.q2: Is insurance included in the rental price?
faq.a2: Yes, all our vehicles come with comprehensive insurance coverage included in the daily rate. This covers vehicle damage, theft, and third-party liability.
faq.q3: What is the deposit amount and when is it refunded?
faq.a3: The security deposit is €1,000, which is fully refundable upon return of the vehicle in good condition. The refund is processed within 5-7 business days.
faq.a4: No, we offer unlimited mileage on all our rentals. Drive as much as you want without worrying about extra charges.
faq.a5: Our pricing is based on rental duration: 1-3 days at €100/day, 4-7 days at €85/day, 8-15 days at €75/day, 16-24 days at €60/day, 25-29 days at €50/day, and 30+ days at €40/day.
faq.a6: All vehicles come fully charged. You'll have access to Tesla's Supercharger network. We provide a charging card and full instructions on how to use it.

testDrive.subtitle: Experience It Yourself
testDrive.title: Ready to experience electric driving?
testDrive.description: Book your Tesla today and discover why electric is the future of driving.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it - hear from our satisfied customers

t1.name: Marko Petrović
t1.text: Outstanding service from start to finish! The Tesla was immaculate, and the booking process couldn't have been easier. Will definitely rent again.

t2.name: Ana Jovanović
t2.text: I've been renting from Tesla Rent for six months now. The pricing is transparent, the vehicles are always in perfect condition, and the team is incredibly helpful.

t3.name: Stefan Nikolić
t3.text: Professional service, pristine vehicles, and competitive pricing. This is how car rental should be. Highly recommended!

t4.name: Jelena Đorđević
t4.text: Electric driving is the future, and Tesla Rent makes it accessible. Great experience every single time I rent from them.
